<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bottled Sunlight](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1532)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This mirrored bottle contains various chemicals dissolved in two immiscible solvents. Shaking the bottle induces chemical reactions that cause it to glow. For 1 hour, the bottle sheds [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) to the next 40 feet).

 During this hour, it can be thrown like a bomb. This requires a single action to Activate with a Strike, like other bombs, and deals the damage below. If it's not thrown within an hour of the first activation, it defuses harmlessly and is consumed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bottled Sunlight (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d4 positive damage and 1 positive [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage, as well as 1d4 additional fire damage. As normal, positive damage harms only [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) and other creatures with [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42). Undead with a particular vulnerability to sunlight (such as [vampires](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=97) or [wraiths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=164)) take the maximum amount of positive damage from bottled sunlight (4 instead of 1d4). For any ability that depends on the number of weapon dice bottled sunlight has, count only the positive damage dice.

>

The bomb deals 2d4 positive damage, 2 positive splash damage, and 2d4 additional fire damage.

>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 3d4 positive damage, 3 positive splash damage, and 3d4 additional fire damage.

>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 4d4 positive damage, 4 positive splash damage, and 4d4 additional fire damage.
